text: læa brrdā p̄hū̂ xyāk mī ṭ̄hāna yeī̀yng k̄heā meụ̄̀x wān nī̂ ca kl̀āw nı wạn phrùngnī̂ ẁā “phụng thrāb t̄heid! Pĕn thī̀ næ̀ nx nẁāxạllxḥˌ nận thrng h̄ı̂ kŵāngk̄hwāng læa thrng h̄ı̂ khạbkhæb sụ̀ng kherụ̄̀xng yạngchīph kæ̀ p̄hū̂ thī̀ phraxngkh̒ thrng pras̄ngkh̒ cāk pwng b̀āw k̄hxng phraxngkh̒ h̄āk mi chı̀ xạllxḥˌ thrng pordprān kæ̀ reā næ̀nxn phraxngkh̒ k̆ ca thrng h̄ı̂ (ṭhrṇī) s̄ūb reā lng pị phụng thrāb t̄heid! Thæ̂cring brrdā p̄hū̂ pt̩is̄eṭh ṣ̄rạthṭhā ca mị̀ pras̄b chạychna”
